security-attribute-namespace
****************************


Description
===========

A managed container for security attributes. A security attribute
namespace is unique in a tenancy. For more information, see Managing
Security Attributes Namespaces.

**Warning:** Oracle recommends that you avoid using any confidential
information when you supply string values using the API.


Available Commands
==================

* cascade-delete

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* update
